plugins.name: claudikins-kernel
plugins.description: Structured workflow plugin enforcing plan → execute → verify → ship with isolated agents, mandatory checkpoints, and state persistence.

plugins.name: claudikins-tool-executor
plugins.description: Meta-MCP server consolidating multiple MCPs into 3 context-efficient tools with semantic search. Reduces token usage from ~25% to 0.5% of context window.

plugins.name: claudikins-grfp
plugins.description: High-quality README creation through dual-AI collaborative analysis. Claude and Gemini analyse your codebase in parallel, research exemplar READMEs, then co-author documentation section by section.

plugins.name: claudikins-klaus
plugins.description: Debugging assistance through Klaus, a dramatically irritated AI persona with Eastern European flair who fixes your code while playing imaginary Pong against you.

plugins.name: claudikins-automatic-context-manager
plugins.description: Automatic context handoff for Claude Code. When context hits 60%, generates a summary and continues in a fresh session.
